code: const{Sequelize,DataTypes}=require('sequelize');const sequelize=new Sequelize('my_hotel_booking_db','Susmita','Susmita@1967',{host:'localhost',dialect:'postgres',port:'5432',dialectModule:require('pg')});async function testConnection(){try{await sequelize.authenticate();console.log('Database connection has been established successfully.');}catch(error){console.error('Unable to connect to the database:',error);}}module.exports={sequelize,DataTypes,testConnection};
